Sequence Information.Peptide Name: NRC-11 (XXA, natural AMPs; fish, animals; UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification: C-terminal NH2.Activity: Active against A. salmonicida 99-1 (MIC 8 uM), A. salmonicida 97-4 (MIC 8 uM), S. enterica serovar Typhimurium MS7953s (MIC 4 uM), S. enterica serovar Typhimurium 14028s (MIC 32 uM), P. aeruginosa K799 or Z61 (MIC 4-32 uM), E. coli CGSC4908 or UB1005 or DC2 (MIC 4-16 uM), S. epidermidis C621 (MIC 64 uM), methicillin-resistant S-aureus C623 (MIC >64 uM), C. albicans C627 (MIC 32 uM). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Patrzykat A, Gallant JW, Seo JK, Pytyck J, Douglas SE.2003
Literature Information.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides derived from flatfish genes
